tree.name: ty
tree.description: An extremely fast Python type checker.

options.name: --help
options.description: Print help

options.name: --version
options.description: Print version

check.name: check
check.description: Check a project for type errors

arguments.name: ...paths
arguments.description: List of files or directories to check [default: the project root]

options.name: --project
options.description: Run the command within the given project directory

options.name: --python
options.description: Path to the Python environment

options.name: --typeshed
options.description: Custom directory to use for stdlib typeshed stubs

options.name: --extra-search-path
options.description: Additional path to use as a module-resolution source (can be passed multiple times)

options.name: --python-version
options.description: Python version to assume when resolving types

options.name: --python-platform
options.description: Target platform to assume when resolving types

options.name: --verbose
options.description: Use verbose output (or `-vv` and `-vvv` for more verbose output)

options.name: --error
options.description: Treat the given rule as having severity 'error'. Can be specified multiple times.

options.name: --warn
options.description: Treat the given rule as having severity 'warn'. Can be specified multiple times.

options.name: --ignore
options.description: Disables the rule. Can be specified multiple times.

options.name: --config
options.description: A TOML `<KEY> = <VALUE>` pair

options.name: --output-format
options.description: The format to use for printing diagnostic messages

options.name: --color
options.description: Control when colored output is used

options.name: --error-on-warning
options.description: Use exit code 1 if there are any warning-level diagnostics

options.name: --exit-zero
options.description: Always use exit code 0, even when there are error-level diagnostics

options.name: --watch
options.description: Watch files for changes and recheck files related to the changed files

options.name: --respect-ignore-files
options.description: Respect file exclusions via `.gitignore` and other standard ignore files. Use `--no-respect-gitignore` to disable

options.name: --help
options.description: Print help (see more with '--help')

options.name: --help
options.description: Print help

options.name: --help
options.description: Print help

options.name: --help
options.description: Print help

help.name: help
help.description: Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

check.name: check
check.description: Check a project for type errors

help.name: help
help.description: Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)
